name: STS Arena Dev
postCreateCommand: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code @beads/bd && echo 'NOTE: You need to set up lib/ with game JARs. See CLAUDE.md for paths.' && mvn dependency:resolve || true
postStartCommand: sudo mkdir -p /home/vscode/.claude /home/vscode/.ssh && sudo cp -r /mnt/host-claude/. /home/vscode/.claude/ && sudo cp -r /mnt/host-ssh/. /home/vscode/.ssh/ && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.claude /home/vscode/.ssh && chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh && chmod 600 /home/vscode/.ssh/*
